EmailTemplate.name: Unlock Instructions - Android
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject} -- Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please see below instructions on how to unlock your Android phone, either for your records, or should you need to distribute to your end users
Note: Unlocking your smartphone will NOT void your manufacturer warranty if done through Rogers. This unlock process requires a non-Rogers SIM card.
1.Turn off your smartphone.
2.Remove your Rogers SIM card from the smartphone.
3.Insert the non-Rogers SIM card back into the smartphone.
4.Turn on the device, and enter when prompted.
5.The device will be unlocked.
Note: Some devices may require a device reboot to complete the process.
